hero.line1: Cemre is alive, but survival depends on support.
hero.line2: A 19-year-old trans woman. Rejected by her family. Homeless. Unsafe.

intro.title: Hi, I'm Cemre
intro.text: I'm 19 years old and a trans woman. My family disowned me and threw me out. I've been homeless for seven months. I've slept on the streets, faced harassment and violence. Right now, I'm not safe. I need your help.

story.title: Cemre's Story

rejection.title: Family Rejection
rejection.text: Cemre is a 19-year-old trans woman. Her family disowned her and threw her out of the house.

homeless.title: Homelessness
homeless.text: She's been homeless for seven months, often sleeping on the streets.

violence.title: Violence & Harassment
violence.text: She has endured harassment, violence, and an attempted rape.

temporary.title: Temporary Shelter
temporary.text: Right now, she's temporarily staying at her boyfriend's home, but it's not safe or stable.

story.quote: I just want to live a normal life like everyone else. To work. To be safe in my own home. To walk without fear…
story.context: In Turkey, it's almost impossible for trans people to find stable work. Cemre is trying, but she needs urgent support to survive.

support.title: Support Cemre
support.subtitle: Every €15 gives Cemre one safe night.
support.goal: Goal: €10,000 for housing, medical care, and essentials.

breakdown.title: Cost Breakdown
breakdown.note: 100% of donations go toward housing, treatment, and survival essentials for Cemre.

real.question: Is this campaign real?
real.answer: Yes. We work directly with Cemre.

money.question: Who handles the money?
money.answer: Campaign owner in Germany transfers all funds directly to Cemre.

safe.question: Is she safe now?
safe.answer: She is not fully safe yet. This campaign is to change that.
